comment.author: 71412405@N00
comment._content: Not Hyde Park, this is in the Fenway, hence the name, but I can't tell if you were kidding.

comment.author: 37793324@N05
comment._content:
Fenway Park is located near Kenmore Square. It's interesting how you see nothing but the park in this photograph as opposed to now where there are buildings everywhere taller than the park.
Fenway is one of the oldest pro ballparks, not to mention the green giant! I wonder if anyone has photos of what it looked like inside!

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thanks for the information about the location of the ballpark.  We will add it to the photo description.
